Todays menu, and I cant stress "todays" enough, was his meal, then a plant he found on the balcony, bread he found somewhere, a plastic bag, toilet paper, spaghetti he stole from me, a slipper, a sock, my bag, followed by two of his regular meals, and still he waited around for food. When he realized he wasnt gonna get any, he had a fight with my stuffed bear and fell asleep on my head for the millionth time today. God I hate that i love him.
